content.p: The university has a 25-meter swimming pool. The university does not guarantee the availability of lifeguard on duty at all times, please use the pool at your own risk. No solo swimming allowed at all times. No electronic devices, running, food/drink or diving is allowed at the pool area. The UNMC sports facilities are open every day of the week (except for Sunday and public holiday) from : This timetable is subject to change without prior notice. Please refer below timetable : telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
